Others: The Royals have lost six consecutive games since their win that brought them into a tie for first place with the Guardians.
The Royals scored just two runs in four consecutive games.
First baseman Vinnie Pasquantino's thumb injury has left a hole in the lineup.
The Royals did cash in on two opportunities with runners in scoring position on Monday.
Maikel Garcia recorded the only hit off Guardians starter Gavin Williams in seven innings.
Yuli Gurriel's double in the eighth was the second and final hit for the Royals.
The Guardians' two-run homer in the fifth inning by Lane Thomas was a turning point in the game.
